attributes.action: Resign : The UK needs a Green PM and he has already proved to be otherwise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Renewable Energy target ditched,  Domestic Waste Tax idea canned,  Carbon Targets are for the rest of Europe to accomplish.

All the signs are that Gordon Brown is a BROWN.  Tony Blair's good work is being undone.  He has all the hallmarks of yesteryears Politics.

The world cannot afford a narrow headed PM that does not take Climate Change seriously.  

I petition that he should resign and give way to a greener replacement with immediate effect.
